description: Targus Business Folio for iPad® 3Business FolioBusiness Tested. Techie Approved.Leave the planner at the office and grab your Business Folio for your iPad instead. With a notepad on one side and an iPad on the other, you’ll have everything you need in one place. Compatible with both the iPad 2 and new iPad (3rd Generation), this is the only iPad folio on the market that also converts to a stand – making it the perfect solution for the pro on the go.Stylish DetailsWith plenty of storage for documents and your business cards, the Business Folio is far from your conventional work folio. Featuring clever stylus storage, you will always have your stylus handy when you need it.  The interior of the Business Foilo also has soft-to-the-touch lining that will protect your iPad from scratches and dust, protecting what’s inside.Storage for documents andyour business cardsClever stylus storageSoft-to-touch interior liningCleanVu™Keep your iPad fingerprint-free with the reusable CleanVu cleaning pad which conveniently stores inside the case for easy use. Made of the same durable exterior and premium interior material as the Business Folio, CleanVu offers a safe and efficient way to clean the screen. The custom pocket securely holds the CleanVu pad while not in use, so it’s always right where you need it when it’s time for some onscreen cleaning. The reusable wipe is sized perfectly for the iPad and features a durable backing with a small pocket that fits on the tip of your finger for effortless cleaning.CleanVu cleaning padSame durable exterior as theBusiness FolioPocket that fits on the tipof your fingerNotepad IncludedNeed to take quick notes in a meeting? For your convenience, a standard size notepad is included with the Business Folio and can be easily replaced. Even with an iPad in hand, you will have easy access for note taking when you’re in a meeting or on the go. With the Business Folio, you get the best of both worlds with a notepad for notes and a sturdy work-in case for the iPad.Notepad includedNotepad can be easily replacedNotepad for notes anda sturdy work-in casePrecision-Cut Camera OpeningThey say a picture is worth a thousand words, but are you tired of having to take your iPad out of the case when taking a picture? The Business Folio has a precision-cut camera hole that prevents shadowing when taking pictures with your iPad for clear, unobstructed images. So capture pictures that last a lifetime with ease.Take pictures with your iPadin the casePrecision-cut camera openingTakes clear, unobstructedimages.GreyNote { font-family : Helvetica; font-size : 9px;
